title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 68.3 - Investments in capital stock of service agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 68.3 - Investments in capital stock of service agency

State Regulations

No savings and loan association shall invest in the capital
stock of a service agency if the aggregate amount of its investment in such
stock, including a proposed investment, would exceed the greater of three
tenths of one percent of the total assets of such savings and loan association
or $3,000 as of the date of such investment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
68.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
